title: Entire audience laughed when it ended
review: We were waiting for the horror and terror reviewers here have clearly been paid to fabricate. I'm a real cinema goer in the UK and my local audience all walked out cursing how overhyped and terribly tranquil the film was. What a rubbish story. It ends with a WTF weird ending too. We shrugged our way out of the cinema with many other confused people who thought IMDB ratings for the first time ever count for nothing.
